triples.name: Artificial neural network
triples.relevance: NeurASP integrates neural networks with answer set programming to combine sub-symbolic and symbolic computation.

triples.name: Answer set programming
triples.relevance: NeurASP extends answer set programming to incorporate neural network outputs as probability distributions over atomic facts.

triples.name: Probability distribution
triples.relevance: NeurASP treats neural network output as a probability distribution over atomic facts in ASP.

triples.name: Computer algebra
triples.relevance: Symbolic computation through answer set programming enables complex semantic constraint reasoning in NeurASP.

triples.name: Symbolic artificial intelligence
triples.relevance: NeurASP applies symbolic reasoning via ASP rules to improve neural network training and perception results.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: NeurASP improves neural network training by incorporating explicit complex semantic constraints from ASP rules.

triples.name: Neuro-symbolic AI
triples.relevance: NeurASP is a novel framework implementing neuro-symbolic AI that integrates neural networks with answer set programming for hybrid sub-symbolic and symbolic reasoning.
